Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory148.png'}
{3: '02:46 PM. Abandoned Dock, West Coast.'}
{3: "Recently, vandalized and adulterated supplies have repeatedly turned up in earthbound bases, prompting a request for Babylonia's assistance."}
{3: 'Seeing that most squads are occupied with their respective missions, this task is assigned to Gray Raven instead.'}
{3: 'Following a trail of clues, your team is led to an abandoned dock.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory89.png'}

{3: 'You can taste the salt in the wind, the nighttime breeze weaving between the tiny shacks and structures. The arrival of the Gray Raven squad seems to have brought a rare hint of liveliness to the place.'}
{3: 'A man in guard attire blocks your way forward.'}
{3: 'Lucia hands him your prepared IDs. The guard takes a look at them and grunts.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dock Guard', 3: 'Wait here.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He returns soon after with your identifications in hand.'}
{2: 'Dock Guard', 3: "Bossman's asking for your tokens. These won't do—word got out about the IDs recently.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Word had gotten out, obviously, for none other than Gray Raven. You do not expect to be discovered so quickly and elicit such a swift response.'}
{2: "We weren't told about any token.", 3: '22', 4: 'Your probably forgot to send us one.', 5: '22'}
{2: 'Dock Guard', 3: 'Everyone here was delivered one.', 4: '1'}
{2: "But you've only just found out about it!", 3: '24', 4: 'You must have misplaced ours.', 5: '24'}
{2: 'Dock Guard', 3: 'Bossman said everyone was delivered one, so everyone was delivered one.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The guard puts his hand on his weapon, his eyes darting between the four of you. A fight will most definitely ensue should the Gray Ravens insist.'}
{2: 'Dock Guard', 3: 'Better leave now. No good to anyone if we fight.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Gray Ravens all back away and leave.'}
{3: 'A sudden wave of onshore wind gusts through the crowded dock, lifting away the tattered hood of a passerby, revealing a pair of familiar eyes.'}
{3: 'The man standing next to the boy hears what you call him and turns to look at the cloaked young figure.'}
{3: 'The man standing next to the boy notices your gaze. He stops and turns to look at the cloaked young figure.'}
{1: '1', 3: "He grabs the boy by the collar. The sudden jolt yanks away the boy's hood, revealing a practiced and composed smile."}
{3: 'Realizing that this is not the best time for a reunion, Liv abruptly stops.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dock Guard', 3: "Hey, no fighting! These folks don't have their tokens. How about you?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Of course we do! Loosen up, man. I gotta show him the thing.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The man lets go of Changyu. The two of them each take out an ancient coin that seemingly originates from Kowloong.'}
{2: 'An ancient coin...', 3: '48', 4: 'Looks Kowloong to me...', 5: '48'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Looks like they're all associated with Kowloong.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Perhaps they're left behind by the Nighter.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The guard is busy inspecting the ancient coins, failing to notice what you are all whispering.'}
{2: 'Dock Guard', 3: "Coins look right, but they're just for the two of you. What's their deal, then?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Oh well, I have no idea.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The guard and the cloaked man both look at Changyu in suspicion.'}

{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'C\'mon, it\'s hard not to run into a few familiar faces, the way we business folks get around. Doesn\'t mean I\'ve stuck my nose into everyone\'s "family matters," y\'know?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Changyu turns to your group tongue-tied and frowns in frustration.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Now, I've still got some business with my friend here. Let's talk some other time, cool?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "That better be true. If I found out you were lying, I'll—", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "Sure, sure—you'll doublecross us with your 200 inside men and blow our train to kingdom come, am I right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "Just think about it. If someone from Akdilek was competent enough for a job like that, they wouldn't have sent me with you.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Changyu stands on his toes to match the man's height. He gives the cloaked figure a pat on the back, alongside a grin and a vial of serum."}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Here, take this. Nothing more calming than a shot of this, right? Now, this is your turf—care to show me the way?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Changyu turns to your group again with the same frustrated look.'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "I couldn't care less. They can take care of themselves.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A muffled thunder from behind the clouds is hinting at an upcoming storm. The Gray Ravens exchange glances with each other and, eventually, depart the abandoned dock.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'There goes our lead.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What do we do with Changyu?', 3: '87', 4: 'The man next to Changyu seems to be threatening him.', 5: '87'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Not that we can do anything right now. You heard the man with the bomb-rigged train, didn't you?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I'll look into the tokens and see if we can get ahold of them... Meanwhile, let's figure out a way to meet Changyu.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Wait—I just got a message from him.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '"Meet me in my secret lair."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Secret lair?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Hold on... He also attached a set of coordinates—of an underground warehouse 45km away.', 4: '2'}
{2: "Let's check it out.", 3: '95', 4: "There's nothing we can do here anyway.", 5: '95'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "You're right. Let's go.", 4: '2'}
